charges.charge_description: 21:963, 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(2)(B)(ii); Title 18 United States Code, Sections 3551-ATTEMPT/CONSPIRACY-NARCOTICS-SELL/DISTRIBUTE/DISPENSE-Cocaine (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The deft. is hereby placed on probation for a term of 5 years. All open counts are dismissed on the motion of the United States. Special Assessment of $50.00 due immediately. (1s)
